# icons-fontawesome



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                                      | Type                                                                     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | The color of the icon. This can be a css color name, hex value or custom property. Examples: --primary-color \| blue \| #c412ef \| primary-color | `string`                                                                 | `undefined` |
| `name`   | `name`    | The name of the icon.                                                                                                                            | `string`                                                                 | `undefined` |
| `size`   | `size`    | The size of the icon.                                                                                                                            | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small" \| "x-large" \| "x-small" \| "xx-large"` | `'small'`   |
| `type`   | `type`    | The icon prefix.                                                                                                                                 | `"fab" \| "far" \| "fas"`                                                | `undefined` |
